scripts.start: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('./build-info.json', JSON.stringify({ buildDate: new Date().toISOString() }));" && node app.js
scripts.dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('./build-info.json', JSON.stringify({ buildDate: new Date().toISOString() }));" && node app.js
